Description: Do a 5-minute stretch to wake up your body. Reach for the sky, touch your toes, and twist gently.
Drink a glass of water to kickstart hydration. Add a lemon slice for zest!
Review your calendar and to-do list. Prioritize 3 key tasks for focus.
Choose an outfit that matches your mood and goals. Rock that confidence!
Eat a light, energizing breakfast like yogurt and fruit or toast with avocado.
